page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: EVENING SPENT,HOBBIES,CLUBS, TELEVISION. CHILDREN BED9-9.30P.M. ADULTS 11-12P.M. FOOD PREPARATION:KITCHEN TOOLS USED FOR MEAL,ROLLING PIN,KNIFE,POTATO PEELER,SAUCEPANS,OVEN. APPLIANCES USED IN KITCHEN:WASHING MACHINE,TUMBLE DRYER,REFRIGERATOR,ELECTRIC IRON, TOASTER,KETTLE,FOOD MIXER. COOKING IN WINKLEIGH :ELECTRICTY, BOTTLED GAS,WOOD, COAL OR OIL. ELECTRIC APPLIANCES IN HOME: HAIRDRYER,SEWING MACHINE,LAWNMOWER, MUSIC CENTRES,MICRO-COMPUTERS, TELEVISION,VIDIO RECORDERS. {SAFTY}ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES TO BE WIRED CORRECTLY,FIRES TO BE WELL GUARDED. DECOR:FLOORS COVERED BY CARPET, TILES, VINYL.CURTAINS OR BLINDS AT WINDOWS. WALLS: WALLPAPER,TILES,PAINT,MIRRORS
